item.title: [317 PI] Remove doors?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“morot4, post:6, topic:547960”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666864.msg4459035#msg4459035 date=1416522948]

remove please

OP please don’t do this every time you ask for help. The point of the forums (and publicly giving help) is so when people search an issue or error (Either on a popular search engine or using the forum’s search feature) they can come to this topic.
Removing the topic body ruins the point of that, as the searcher won’t know the full context of the post.

What you did is basically equivalent to Posey700’s thread where he removed his snippet containing the answer you wanted.
Does that make sense?

String#contains?

That’s what I have there?
[/quote]

I’m sorry.

Solution to what i did:

Find “customobjects” in your source
i then made another custom object spawn line
then i changed the object id to -1 and entered the doors coordinates.

and bam the door is gone

sorry, selfish of me[/quote]

That only removes the door server sided.
If you enter a new region with “custom objects” spawned, you’ll notice it takes a second for them all to load. That’s because they’re spawned server sided and the data is being sent (as fast as it can) from the server to your client.

Hence why I gave a client sided fix.

Read full topic

Solution to what i did:

then i changed the object id to -1 and entered the doors coordinates.

and bam the door is gone

sorry, selfish of me

item.title: [317 PI] Remove doors?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:547960”]Hella simple…
Client sided find your ObjectDef.java
Add this under the objectDef.readValues(stream);

if(objectDef != null && objectDef.name != null) { if(objectDef.name.toLowerCase().contains("door")) { for(int q = 0; q < objectDef.anIntArray773.length; q++) objectDef.anIntArray773[q] = 0; objectDef.hasActions = false; } }

Credits to Poesy700 for the original code.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/527803-removing-all-doors.html
(Note that he removed)[/quote]

String#contains?

Read full topic
